content: AFTER OVER A YEAR....THE MEGAMOD IS FINALLY RELEASED TO THE PUBLIC!!!
Special thanks to my Playtesters and BWD Eggforcers for all their help with playtesting!
[MegaMod] Added some more proxies to The MegaMod userscript
[MegaMod] Preventions added to stop mods from breaking in case of failed source code modification
[MegaMod] Added warning popup in case of failed source code modification
[Better UI: Better Inventory] Minor optimizations made
[Legacy Mode: Legacy Default Skins] Fixed crashing at startup for new anon players
[MegaMod] Behind-the-scenes reworks of the Update Info and Changelog popups
[Better UI: Player Weapon Icons] Fixed bug with icons on player list not updating properly
[Better UI: Player Weapon Icons] Player List icons now show when someone swaps to pistol or uses melee
[Better UI: Player Weapon Icons] Player List icons now have a small fade animation when they change
[Better UI: Player Weapon Icons] Kill Feed now shows when someone gets a kill using melee or grenade
[Better UI: Spatula Icons] Player List Glows and shows a spatula icon next to the player holding the spatula.
[Better UI: Spatula Icons] Kill Feed shows a spatula icon next to the player holding the spatula.
[Better UI: General UI Tweaks] Color of everything inside player slot of currently spectating player changed to white.
[Better UI: General UI Tweaks] Fixed width of horizontal bar below announcement message.
[Better UI: General UI Tweaks] Fixed bug with game code input typing out modifier key names (SHIFT, CTRL, etc).
[Better UI: Better Inventory] Fixed minor bugs with Item Vault when switching in/out of inventory
[Better Chat: Detect Game Codes] Tweaks made to the leave game popup!
[Better Chat: Detect Game Codes] Alert message added to stop you from joining the game you're currently in.
[Better Chat: Detect Game Codes] Fixed bug with player popup opening when game codes were clicked.
[Better UI: Better Inventory] Fixed bug with VIP item reward not showing on VIP item popup.
[Better UI: Better Inventory] Bundle and VIP Notification popups have been tweaked to match their item themes.
[Better UI: Player Weapon Icons] Scoreboard now shows the primary weapons used by players.
[Better UI: Player Weapon Icons] Kill Feed now show the primary weapons (or pistol) used by players.
[Better UI: Kill Distance] Shows the kill distance next to kills in the Kill Feed.
[Theme Manager] Infinite, Graysocean, Boolet themes now change name colors in Chat and Kill Feed in FFA.
[Better Eggforce: Disable Chat Filter] Minor bugfix - MOD messages don't show up as blocked.
[MegaMod Settings] Reload Required Popup now shows which settings require a reload
[Better UI: Better Inventory] Premium Items that are only obtainable through bundles now have the Bundle item theme
[Better UI: Better Inventory] Tweaked item sorting order so Bundle Items are now above Premium Items
[Better UI: Better Inventory] Added Item Theme Info Popup, opened by clicking the item theme icon on a selected item
[Better UI: Better Inventory] Code Cracked popup now matches the item theme of the redeemed item
[Better UI: Better Inventory] Chick'n Winner popup now matches the item theme of the rewarded item or owned item (after you reveal the item)
[Better UI] Merged Profile Badges and Profile Picture into one setting: Better Profile
[Better UI] More Settings! Separated Chick'n Winner and Challenge Upgrades from General UI Tweaks
[Better UI] All the chat features have moved to a separate mod, Better Chat!
[Better Chat: Chat Icons] Created separate setting for chat icons
[Better Chat: Chat Translator] Introducing the Translate feature for chat messages (ty Google Translate)!
[Better Chat: Detect Game Codes] Game codes in chat messages are now clickable!
[Better Chat: Chat Events] Shortened player join/leave message.
[Better Eggforce: Disable Chat Filter] Blacklisted chat messages now highlight what parts of the message are blacklisted.
[MegaMod Settings] Mods are now put on pages which can be scrolled through!
[Hide HUD] Minor tweaks made to show HUD when despawning and auto-hide HUD when spawning or spectating
[Hide HUD] Challenge Sound Effect no longer plays when HUD is hidden with "Hide Game Messages" setting enabled
[Better UI] Fixed errors with Game History when checking if games are still open
[Better UI] Fixed issues with chat scrolling
[Better Eggforce] Added Auto-Ban feature
[Better Eggforce] Eggforcers can now disable the chat filter
[Custom Theme] Added the Zaxonius Theme (WIP)
[Custom Skybox] Added Randomize Skybox setting to randomize the skybox each time you enter a game
[Custom Skybox] Tron Skybox actually works now :o
[Custom Skybox] You can now see a small preview of the selected skybox in settings
[Custom Fog] Added Randomize Fog setting to randomize the fog density and color each time you enter a game
The MegaMod works once again...for now anyway! Yay, I guess...
Observe toggle longer needs to open a new link when toggling observer mode
Added Spectate-Only ESP to the Better Eggforce mod
Fixed bug with the requirements for "Treasure Hunter" Badge
New code input now works with pasted game links and autofills observer details from pasted links
Accounts that don't have profile pictures get a default one shown on the profile screen
Added some more preset ban reasons
Tweaked default selected ban reason and chat message
Minor tweaks made to observer toggle - it no longer needs to open a new link when changing the WatchPlayer UniqueID
Added Ban History button and popup to the home screen
Added the "Eggcellent Hatchday!" badge - obtainable on your account's birthday!
Added small in-game alerts for mods with toggle keybinds (Hide HUD & Spectate Tweaks Freeze Frame)
Chat Event messages now have different icons to represent each chat event
Added chat events for spatula pick up and drop
Better UI now restyles the join game code input to work better with the new game code format
Added the Better Eggforce mod, exclusive to Eggforcers, which introduces some helpful Eggforcing-related features
Fixed alignment issues with the Chick'n Winner despawn menu bar
Brought back the Chick'n Winner bar on the respawn menu
Color picker icon changed from paint palette to eye dropper
Added challenge notification popup to Hide HUD (through "Hide Game Messages")
Added Infinite Chat History setting for Better UI
Due to the recent database update, "Eggstra Spender" Badge is now forced to use the % of Premium items you own
The Eggsassins have won, revealing the dragon icon for the "Shadowborn Survivor" Badge!
"Eggsassin" Badge (lifetime KDR in every game mode) renamed to "Eggliminator"
Added "Eggsassin" and "Egg-Fu Master" Badges (based on which side you were on)
Fixed Loading bug caused by Shell Shockers version 1.0.0 update
More code optimizations made to Better Inventory for faster tab switching
Added Reset Button for Custom Fog Mod (resets the fog to the map's default settings)
RGB Color Sliders for Custom Skybox and Custom Fog have been replaced with Color Pickers
The Server Select dropdown is now back on the home screen!
New icon for the MegaMod settings (gear) tab to denote that it contains settings for the MegaMod itself
Fixed major loading bug, fixed lots of mod errors, & cleaned up a bunch of code
Added Custom Fog Mod (will work once BWD fixes the in-game fog system)
Official BWD Content Creators now get profile badges linked to their social media account!
Added the "Shadowborn Survivor" (EGG ORG 2025) event badge, which will be unlocked with its icon revealed once the event ends.
Added the "Shell League Staff" and "Shell Wiki Staff" badges for Shell League and Shell Wiki staff members
Changed icons for tiers 1-3 of the "Pro Egg Gamer" badge
Optimized Better Inventory code for faster item loading/tab switching times
Introducing the Item Vault! You can now preview unowned vaulted items in the inventory.
Fixed bug with profile badge alert popup getting stuck on startup
Icons on Social items now link to their respective BWD Social Media pages
Fixed bugs with Game History after loading screen & game code format update
Major changes (fixes) made to King Hayden theme
Minor changes made to Infinite, Graysocean, Boolet themes
Fixed bug with Chick'n Winner Owned Item Images showing for all 3 eggs
Fixed bug with Game History glitching after seasonal maps get removed
Removed # in front of game codes on the Game History popup
The Chick'n Winner Popup can now only be closed after you get your reward  - no more accidental closures!
The Corrupted Grenade has been promoted to Premium item status!
Fixed Errors with Custom Skybox Mod (caused by Update 0.50.9)
Game History now periodically checks whether games are still open
Switching Better Inventory on/off now looks much smoother
Map Images on the Game History and Public Maps popups now match the Create Private Game popup
Chick'n Winner now shows when you pull an item you already own!
Fixed Chick'n Winner egg icon not being on the same line as egg reward amount
The MegaMod can now check for updates even when a fatal error occurs.
New button & popup added to the homescreen to show your daily lobby history!
Minor tweaks made to the Bundle item theme criteria
Hide HUD now hides the announcement messages in chat
SFX added to the challenge claim notification popup
Date related profile badges now work more accurately with different date formats
Fixed bug with profile badge CSS not loading
Better UI now adds your region's numerical separators to your egg count, stats, shop item prices, and MOAR!
The currency icon on Premium items (in inventory) should now match your local currency
Fixed loading issue caused by Update 0.50.4
Fixed "Yolky Merch" Badge not showing up
Restyled "Overeggchiever" V Badge
Restyled "Eggspenditure" V Badge
Restyled "Shell Scrambler" IV and V Badges
Restyled "Master of Arms" V Badge
Restyled "Splattered Yolk" V Badge
Restyled "Rooster Royalty" V Badge
Restyled "Coop King" V Badge
Restyled "Poached Promoter" V Badge
Tier badges now have alerts for when they level down, are gained, or are lost!
Core badges now have an alert for when you gain or lose them!
Shell now automatically reloads after you update The MegaMod!
Fixed tier badge level up alert showing when badges level down
Fixed stamps not being sorted correctly in the inventory
Buffed tier requirements for "Eggstra Spender" Badge
Buffed tier requirements for "Eggspenditure" Badge
Fixed grenade pickups not updating in first-person spectate mode
Fixed "killstreak" typo - thanks Godric!
Fixed egg premium items not being grouped with premiums
Optimized some setting saving logic
Tweaked color of "Very Good Wizard" Badge to match BWD Blue
Refined requirement for "Treasure Hunter" Badge to include account age
Buffed tier requirements for "Royal Rooster" Badge
Buffed tier requirements for "Coop King" Badge
Tier badges now show a notification when they level up!
Added the Gus theme and matching Gus skybox!
Fixed some buggy code - skyboxes should load properly now
Work-in-Progress (WIP) themes: King Hayden, Novosuper, and menoXD
Rewrote some Better Inventory code
Color slider colors should be auto-applied more reliably now
Added some Work-in-Progress (WIP) themes: King Hayden, Novosuper, and menoXD
The first update for playtesters!
Fixed bug with Better UI enabling even when disabled
Added new tier badges: Splattered Yolk (lifetime deaths) and Humpty's Fall (fall deaths)
Ishmyster, Grinder, and Simsim - enjoy your Playtester Badges!
The MegaMod is open for playtesting - enjoy!
Fixed some typos in the UI
Fixed bug with skybox settings not saving properly
Themes load slightly faster
Testing script auto-update feature - fingers crossed!
MegaMod startup should be more reliable now...hopefully
Fixed all the bugs caused by the Game Engine Update (0.50.0)
Added support for proxies (Alternate URLs) to MegaMod userscript
Fixed some minor UI bugs with inventory items and profile badges
Mods and their settings are on the brand new tabs in the settings menu.
Improved UI & Fixed Bugs in the inventory, profile screen, and elsewhere!
Enhanced In-Game Chat with various tweaks and upgrades!
Profile Pictures return and Profile Badges added to the profile screen!
Legacy default gun skins and sound effects from 2018/2019 have returned!
VIP color customization with hue, saturation, and brightness sliders.
Hide the HUD (in-game UI) for cleaner recordings and cinematic shots.
Added a stopwatch while spawned. Detailled killstreak stats popup coming soon!
Grenade pickups match your equipped grenade skin - also works in first-person spectate mode!
Use the FPS slider to set a custom FPS cap and finally play like a pro.

Various features added to spectate mode:
  • See a player's health bar in first-person spectate mode.
  • Effortlessly fly around maps with a slider to adjust spectate speed.
  • Freeze the game in spectate mode for the perfect action shot.
  • ...and more!
Spin your egg 360° in the Photobooth and export it as a GIF (coming soon).
Explore a handful of custom themes to customize the Shell Shockers UI.
Choose from over 60 new skybox options or any solid color for a unique in-game atmosphere!
Customize the in-game fog with adjustable density and color to create anything from a light mist to complete blindness!
[Eggforcers Only] Eggforce more efficiently with many helpful eggforcing-related features so that you can focus on swinging that ban hammer!
